entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Whale Cove
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:19 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 41.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 41. Wind chill minus 62 this morning and minus 57 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Monday 20 February 2023
